name: llama_index (run-llama)
description: [项目级] LlamaIndex is the leading document agent and OCR platform。来源: https://github.com/run-llama/llama_index

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: **NOTE**: This README is not updated as frequently as the documentation. Please check out the documentation above for the latest updates!

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
from llama_index.core.llms import LLM
from llama_index.llms.openai import OpenAI
```
